Units.summary: Represents a colletion of Unit objects.

LJCDeserialize.summary: Deserializes from the specified XML file.

remarks.para: If the requested XML file does not exist, a default file will be created with 24 standard Units.
A default UnitLookup XML file will also be created if it does not exist.

Add.summary: Creates and adds the object from the supplied values.
Add.returns: A reference to the added item.
